title.rendered: Apply Now | University of Western Ontario International Program 2024

content.rendered:
University of Western Ontario Science/Non-Science courses admission requirement. 

This is to inform all student who have been in need of science /non science admission requirement that the requirement is as follows

The Admission  requirement is as follows:

Institution University of Western Ontario
Length of program 4-5 years
Academic requirements 3-years undergrad (15 full credits) any discipline, at a recognized university

at least 2 full academic years within (September-April) with a minimum of 5 full or equivalent (eq) courses (30 credit hours) are used for calculation of Grade Point Average (GPA)

3 full or equivalent senior courses (2nd year +) must be included in at least 1 of 2 undergrad years being used in GPA.
Required Science courses A total of 3 or equivalent courses:

  •   1 full or eq. course in Biology with lab
  •   1 full or eq course in Organic Chemistry with lab or 2 half courses in Organic Chemistry with at least 1 lab or 2 half courses: 1 in Organic Chemistry with lab and 1 in Biochemistry with or without lab
  •   There must be 1 other full or equivalent Science course that is not related  to Biology or Chemistry (ex. Physics, Math, Computer Science)
Required non-Science courses A total of 3 full or equivalent Non-Science courses will be needed (any discipline) with at least 1 full credit which must be an essay course (examples, but not limited to English, French, Philosophy, Visual Arts, Women’s Studies, Economics, Music, Anthropology, Geography, History, Political Science, Psychology, and Sociology).
Non-academic requirements
  •   Confidential Assessment Form
  •   Interview
  •    The St. John’s or equivalent is Standard in First Aid and Cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) Basic Rescuer Course before enrolment

 The above content is the admission requirement in different courses  for a future student who wishes to study at  Western University in Ontario we wish you a successful academic session

You can see also>>>>>>>>York University Admission Form for Italian Studies – BA, Courses Requirement
